name: Snake Hunter
description:
Snake Hunter

Snake Season is open! 

You - the Snake - need to survive as long as possible in a world filled with hunters.

How To Play How to Win

Survive as long as possible.

Keys
  • WASD - Change snake direction;
Apples
  • Keep eating apples to fill the energy bar;
  • If it reaches zero, it's game over.
Hunters
  • Hunters try to kill the snake by shooting it in the head;
  • They only appear during the day;
  • Can only be killed during the night, while they are sleeping;
  • If they shoot the snake in the body, it cuts the snake on that section.
ScoreSpace Jam #23

This game was developed for the ScoreSpace Jam #23 with the theme of  "Survival".

Game Engine

I've used Unity to create this game.
